thread.section_title: PC Cleaner Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Cleaner Inc. | www.pc-cleaners.com
thread.title: Sophia Miller
thread.title_full: PC Cleaner Inc. reviewed by Sophia Miller

author: Sophia Miller
title: Sophia Miller
text: Good experience.. Had difficulty finding the "Registration" button after logging back into PC Cleaner Pro and had to try many links before it appeared. Was time-consuming and an inconvenience. The "Registration" button should be on the main screen to make logging on for updates easier.
